Text: OPIC presentation Cc attached please find the OPIC presentation Also attached is a flowchart I drafted in an attempt to put together the offbalance sheet financing take out financing and development efforts Regards Luiz Forwarded by Luiz WatanabeSAEnron on PM From Joseph M nronXgate on PM CST To Brett R nron Ranabir nronXgate Ricardo nron Peter N AndersonENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT John R nron John HardyENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Julia H nronXgate Ricardo nron Luiz nron nronXgate nronXgate cc Robert N MossENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Luiz nron Ricardo D nron Jose Lucio nron Glauco nron Roberto NRON Subject OPIC presentation attached hereto is the latest version of the OPIC presentation that including Ayres engineering presentation and to be discussed on Wed pm at Skaddens offices For those traveling please note that the meeting in DC is business casual jmg

Re EnronOnline Credit Derivatives Propsoed Reference Entities Cc find some additional minor information I recently received from the people at Elektro Regards Luiz Carlos E Bianchini We did not identify any company contained in the list as Elektros client Howerver the following similarities in company names were identified Basf AKTIENGESELLSCHAFT We found Basf S A Stio So Joo Santo Antnio de Posse BG Group plc We found BG Brasil Ind Alim Ltda Estrada de Angatuba Angatuba Eaton Corporation We found Eaton Ltda Diviso de Trasmisso Rod SP Canteiro de Obras Mogi Mirim Litton Industries Inc We found Litton do Brasil Ltda Rodovia D Pedro I Jarinu Texaco Limited We found Texaco Brasil Av Carlos A C Pinto Atibaia Jose Hilario Farina Portes We did not have any directly dealing with most of the listed companies We would like however to mention Cooper Industrues Inc former McGrawEdison Company who supplied a significant number of restarters religadores type KF and Oracle who we will most likely use as foundation for our technical systems Osvaldo Esteban Clari Redes Please see attachment Rob Walls PM To Sami ArapENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Luiz WatanabeENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Mark CT Subject Re EnronOnline Credit Derivatives Propsoed Reference Entities Sami Lets discuss There may be an issue here If you are unable to reach me please try and get in touch with Mark Taylor directly Thanks Sami Arap AM To Rob WallsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Luiz WatanabeENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re EnronOnline Credit Derivatives Propsoed Reference Entities Rob Due to Randys week trip to London I am not sure if you have received any of this As per Federico Cerisolis information with respect to fuel transactions concerns we are having discussions in Brazil and Bolivia with subsidiaries of some of the names Ive seen in the file such as BP Amoco BG Exxon Mobil Shell Total These discussions are only about physical transactions and never about credit derivatives With respect to Argentina please see Mike Guerrieros comments below Regards Sami Forwarded by Sami ArapENRONDEVELOPMENT on PM Enron International From Michael Guerriero AM To Sami ArapENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Re EnronOnline Credit Derivatives Propsoed Reference Entities No Argentine Companies are on this list If you would like a list of Argentine ISDAs let me know MFG Sami Arap AM To Don BlackENRON my previous memo outlining the propsosed business and our concerns
